channel.title: 508 new weapon looks and pvp armours
channel.description:
The pvp armours and new long swords and scims. Btw, I quit a lonnnnnnnnngggggggg time ago so I dont know which models in my models folder are the new weapons and pvp armours; therefore i added them all.
[size=10pt][b]Download is at the bottom![/b][/size]
[i]Quick guide on how to add them[/i]
1. You need a client that has a "Models" folder. 2. Download them add these models in the "Models" folder. 3. Go into Applet_Sub1 and search up [code]break;[/code] 4. After the "break;", add the ints in. 5. I dont remember but you might have to like log on to your server with the client and type in like [code]additem (code)[/code]
Also by downloading, please don't leech =/
[size=25pt][b][i][u]DOWNLOAD LINK[/u][/i][/b][/size]
[size=20pt][b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ywmztzb4t2e]DOWNLOAD NOW[/url][/b][/size] [size=20pt][b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ywmztzb4t2e]DOWNLOAD NOW[/url][/b][/size] [size=20pt][b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ywmztzb4t2e]DOWNLOAD NOW[/url][/b][/size] [size=20pt][b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ywmztzb4t2e]DOWNLOAD NOW[/url][/b][/size] [size=20pt][b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ywmztzb4t2e]DOWNLOAD NOW[/url][/b][/size] [size=20pt][b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ywmztzb4t2e]DOWNLOAD NOW[/url][/b][/size] [size=20pt][b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ywmztzb4t2e]DOWNLOAD NOW[/url][/b][/size]

@needhoster wrote:

The pvp armours and new long swords and scims. Btw, I quit a lonnnnnnnnngggggggg time ago so I dont know which models in my models folder are the new weapons and pvp armours; therefore i added them all.

[size=10pt]Download is at the bottom![/size]

Quick guide on how to add them

  1. You need a client that has a “Models” folder.
  2. Download them add these models in the “Models” folder.
  3. Go into Applet_Sub1 and search up break;
